p: The root powder of the plant was orally administered to Wistar Albino rats at a dose of 10 mg/kg body weight to investigate response against cold swimming stress. After the administration of the powder for seven days, animals were sacrificed on the 8 th day after exposure to cold water swimming stress. The study revealed that the plant root powder increased plasma corticosterone level, phagocytic index, and avidity index when rats were exposed to cold water swimming test ( 271).
